North Brisbane FC

The premier football club

Come Play

Welcome to North Brisbane FC, the home of football in Lutwyche and part of the Football Brisbane Competition.


Recruiting for the 2018 Season now.

Fitness, fun and health. North Brisbane FC strives to be the best, and to help you be the best you can be.
Located at Prentice Park, Lutwyche.
Competing in the Football Brisbane Competition, we have senior mens and womens teams.
